snippet.title: RPG Fernz Gate - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Muster the strength to slay the Overlord and find a way back home!
Fernz Gate is now available for Android/iPhone!

Google Play:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kemco.execreate.fernzgatepremium
App Store:
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id1261265470?mt=8

- Travel to the other side and beyond!
- Muster the strength to slay the Overlord and find a way back home!
- Intuitive 2D battles!
- Join forces with buddies to decimate foes!
- Even a few familiar faces!
- Deal with enemies on your own terms!


©2016 KEMCO/EXE-CREATE
※All graphics terms, characters and elements are subject to change in the actual product.
